name: Turret Run
description:
Turret Run is a 3D  ball rolling platformer where the objective is to dodge the turrets and trees while trying to finish the game as fast as possible! PLease leave your feedback as ! will continue to update the prototype and eventually get a polished result since this is my first game. You can also feel free to tweet me @aliakacoast with screenshots of your best time so I can update world records. Thanks!

Current World Record:

Rayan Shahid @TheExalt

00:12:09

(Made in Unity)
